summary.span: 表示從裝載 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的伺服器要求的 .aspx 檔案 (也稱為 Web Forms 頁面)。

span.span: Represents an .aspx file, also known as a Web Forms page, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是.aspx 副檔名的檔案與相關聯。The class is associated with files that have an .aspx extension. 這些檔案會編譯成執行階段物件，並在伺服器記憶體中快取。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 如果您想要建立 Web Form 網頁使用的程式碼後置技巧，衍生自這個類別。If you want to create a Web Forms page using the code-behind technique, derive from this class. 快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 中，會自動使用此模型來建立 Web Form 頁面。Rapid application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, automatically use this model to create Web Forms pages. 物件做為所有的伺服器控制項在頁面中，除了可實作命名容器介面，或是會實作這個介面的控制項的子控制項。The object serves as the naming container for all server controls in a page, except those that implement the interface or are child controls of controls that implement this interface. 類別是做為 Web 應用程式的使用者介面，並在這種情況應該仔細檢查要撰寫安全程式碼及保護應用程式會接著請確定最佳作法的控制項。The class is a control that acts as the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 如需這些主題的一般資訊，請參閱[概觀的 Web 應用程式的安全性威脅](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)， [NIB： 安全性原則的最佳作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05)，和[重要的安全性概念](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a), [NIB: Security Policy Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05), and [Key Security Concepts](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md). 如需特定資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 顯示安全的錯誤訊息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用所套用的 HTML 的 Web 應用程式編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425). 下列程式碼範例示範如何類別是在模型中使用程式碼後置頁面。The following code example demonstrates how the class is used in the code-behind page model. 請注意，程式碼後置原始程式檔會宣告繼承自基底網頁類別的部分類別。Note that the code-behind source file declares a partial class that inherits from a base page class. 基礎頁面的類別可以屬於，也可以是另一個類別衍生自。The base page class can be , or it can be another class that derives from . 此外，請注意在部分類別可讓程式碼後置来使用的檔案而不需要頁面上已定義的控制項做為欄位成員定義它們。Furthermore, note that the partial class allows the code-behind file to use controls defined on the page without the need to define them as field members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示對應至前述的程式碼後置原始程式檔的.aspx 檔案。The following code example shows the .aspx file that corresponds to the preceding code-behind source file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)] 您必須使用指示詞，並使用`Inherits`和`CodeFile`屬性，以連結至.aspx 檔案的程式碼後置檔案。You must use the directive and use the `Inherits` and `CodeFile` attributes to link the code-behind file to the .aspx file. 在此範例中，`Inherits`屬性會指出`MyCodeBehind`類別和`CodeFile`屬性會指出包含的類別將語言特定檔案的路徑。In this example, the `Inherits` attribute indicates the `MyCodeBehind` class and the `CodeFile` attribute indicates the path to the language-specific file that contains the class. 下列程式碼範例示範單一檔案網頁模型以及如何存取屬性和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the single-file page model and how to access the property and the property of the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)]

span.span: Registers beginning and ending event handler delegates that do not require state information for an asynchronous page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法將處理常式新增至非同步的網頁。Use the method to add handlers to an asynchronous Web page. 您可以註冊多個非同步處理常式。不過，只有一個處理常式會執行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果您想要同時處理多個非同步方法，您應該使用單一方法，然後啟動多個非同步作業，從該處理常式。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 非同步處理常式呼叫之間和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 第一次，所有事件 (透過事件) 會執行，然後再每個註冊方法呼叫。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 此處理常式完成時，對應方法呼叫。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多個非同步處理常式，會呼叫下一個處理常式。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 呼叫已註冊的非同步事件處理常式之後，其餘頁面事件的呼叫時，開頭為事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用非同步要求，顯示中的本機 Web 伺服器的預設頁面的 HTML 原始程式碼控制項。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/CS/pageaddonprerendercompleteasynccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/VB/pageaddonprerendercompleteasyncvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將需要非同步網頁的狀態資訊的處理常式。Use the method to add handlers that require state information to an asynchronous Web page. 傳入物件`state`參數可以是應用程式中指定的事件處理常式委派之間傳送資訊時所需的任何物件`beginHandler`和`endHandler`參數。The object passed in the `state` parameter can be any object that your application requires to transfer information between event handler delegates specified in the `beginHandler` and the `endHandler` parameters. 您可以註冊多個非同步處理常式。不過，只有一個處理常式會執行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果您想要同時處理多個非同步方法，您應該使用單一方法，然後啟動多個非同步作業，從該處理常式。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 非同步處理常式呼叫之間和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 第一次，所有事件 (透過事件) 會執行，然後再每個註冊方法呼叫。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 此處理常式完成時，對應方法呼叫。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多個非同步處理常式，會呼叫下一個處理常式。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 呼叫已註冊的非同步事件處理常式之後，其餘頁面事件的呼叫時，開頭為事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用非同步要求，顯示中的本機 Web 伺服器的預設頁面的 HTML 原始程式碼控制項。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool AspCompatMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 設定數值，指出頁面是否可以在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 執行緒上執行。

span.span: Sets a value indicating whether the page can be executed on a single-threaded apartment (STA) thread.

value.span: 如果頁面支援 Active Server Pages (ASP) 程式碼，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the page supports Active Server Pages (ASP) code; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，這個屬性可讓頁面以單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 執行緒上執行。When set to `true`, this property allows the page to be executed on a single-threaded apartment (STA) thread. 這可讓頁面以呼叫 STA 元件，例如 Visual Basic 6.0 中開發的元件。This allows the page to call STA components, such as components developed with Visual Basic 6.0. 此屬性設定為`true`也可讓頁面以呼叫 COM + 元件，需要存取 unmanaged 的 ASP 內建物件。Setting this property to `true` also allows the page to call COM+ components that require access to the unmanaged ASP built-in objects. 這些是透過 ASP`ObjectContext`物件或`OnStartPage`方法。These are accessible through the ASP `ObjectContext` object or the `OnStartPage` method. 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定`aspcompat`屬性`true`使用.aspx 檔案中的指示詞。Set the `aspcompat` attribute to `true` using the directive in the .aspx file. 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別設定的屬性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan AsyncTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示處理非同步工作時使用的逾時間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time-out interval used when processing asynchronous tasks.

value.span: ，包含完成非同步工作時允許的時間間隔。

span.span: A that contains the allowed time interval for completion of the asynchronous task.

value.span: 預設的時間間隔為 45 秒。

span.span: The default time interval is 45 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [] 頁面上的非同步逾時表示頁面將會等候執行非同步工作的時間量。The asynchronous time-out of the page represents the amount of time that the page will wait to perform asynchronous tasks. 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定頁面非同步逾時時間間隔使用的 Web 組態檔，或指示詞中。Set the page asynchronous time-out interval using the of the Web configuration file or in the directive. 頁面指示詞會覆寫頁面組態區段中設定的值。Values set in the page configuration section are overwritten by the page directive. 定義您的非同步工作使用類別，並註冊開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式。Define your asynchronous task using the class and register a beginning, an ending, and a time-out handler. 如果未指定之時間間隔內完成非同步工作，就會叫用的逾時的處理常式。If the asynchronous task does not complete in the time interval specified, the time-out handler will be invoked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，以示範非同步工作超過分配的時間中所指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作無法用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生影像，例如和逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作不會在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. 請注意，頁面指示詞中設定屬性。Note that the property is set in the page directive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的物件可讓您儲存及擷取任意資料的後續要求。An application's object allows you to store and retrieve arbitrary data on subsequent requests. 快取不特別相關聯的網頁或使用者工作階段。The cache is not specifically associated with a page or user session. 它主要用來增強應用程式效能。It is used primarily to enhance application performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快取應用程式資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。For more information, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d). 如需有關應用程式快取和頁面輸出快取之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 快取概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)。For more information on the difference between application caching and page output caching, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將插入到兩個整數的總和物件使用屬性。The following code example inserts the sum of two integers into the object using the property. 它接著會擷取值使用方法並將它寫入Web 伺服器控制項。It then retrieves the value using the method and writes it to a Web server control. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClientTarget { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，讓您覆寫瀏覽器能力的自動偵測，並指定網頁在特定瀏覽器用戶端要如何顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that allows you to override automatic detection of browser capabilities and to specify how a page is rendered for particular browser clients.

value.span: ，指定您要覆寫的瀏覽器能力。

span.span: A that specifies the browser capabilities that you want to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定屬性，物件相關聯屬性會反映用戶端瀏覽器的功能。If you do not set the property, the object associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. 如果您要設定這個屬性，用戶端瀏覽器偵測已停用，頁面將會使用您提供的值 （別名） 相關聯的瀏覽器功能。If you do set this property, client browser detection is disabled and the page will use browser capabilities associated with the value (alias) that you provide. Web 伺服器電腦上的根 Web.config 組態檔會定義下列預設別名，您可以使用縮寫為一般使用者代理字串：The root Web.config configuration file on the Web server computer defines the following default aliases that you can use as shorthand for common user-agent strings: - `uplevel`指定瀏覽器的功能相當於 Internet Explorer 6.0。`uplevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to Internet Explorer 6.0. - `downlevel`指定瀏覽器的功能相當於舊的瀏覽器不支援用戶端指令碼。`downlevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to older browsers that do not support client script. 若要判斷 Web 網頁如何運作的瀏覽器已停用用戶端指令碼中，您可以使用此別名。You can use this alias to determine how Web pages would work in a browser that has client script disabled. 您可以設定使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式的別名，或您可以設定它使用以宣告方式`ClientTarget`指示詞的屬性。You can set the alias programmatically using this property, or you can set it declaratively using the `ClientTarget` attribute of the directive. 您可以定義中的其他別名`clientTarget`應用程式層級 Web.config 檔案區段。You can define additional aliases in the `clientTarget` section of the application-level Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[clienttarget 的各種項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)。For more information, see [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義`ie302`別名並包含其 Web.config 檔案中設定您的應用程式所需的各節。The following code example defines an `ie302` alias and includes sections needed to configure your application in its Web.config file. 使用此別名，您可以設定屬性`ie302`和自訂頁面特別針對 Internet Explorer 3.02 和瀏覽器。Using this alias, you can set the property to `ie302` and customize pages specifically for Internet Explorer 3.02 browsers. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定`Culture`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中的屬性。Set the `Culture` attribute in the directive in the .aspx file. 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別就會設定這個屬性的值。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the value of this property. 此外，您可以同時也可以明確設定的值屬性以程式設計方式或元素中的 Web.config 檔案。In addition, you can also explicitly set the value of the property programmatically or in the element of the Web.config file. 屬性用來協助當地語系化頁面內容。The property is used to help localize page content. 您可以將任何有效的文化特性識別碼。You can set it to any valid culture ID. 例如，`en-us`文化特性 ID 將頁面設定為美國英文，while`fr`文化特性 ID 設定為法文的頁面。For example, the `en-us` culture ID sets the page to American English, while the `fr` culture ID sets the page to French. 您也可以設定的值`auto`執行瀏覽器的自動偵測的慣用語言，並將其設定。You can also set the value to `auto` which will perform automatic detection of the browser's preferred language and set it. 自動語言偵測可以採用預設值，例如`auto:en-us`。The automatic language detection can be qualified with a default value such as `auto:en-us`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出頁面是否驗證回傳和回呼事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page validates postback and callback events.

value.span: 如果網頁會驗證回傳和回呼事件，則為 ，否則為 。預設為 。

span.span: if the page validates postback and callback events; otherwise, .The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，ASP.NET 驗證控制項事件來自呈現該控制項的使用者介面。When the property is set to `true`, ASP.NET validates that a control event originated from the user interface that was rendered by that control. 控制項在呈現期間註冊其事件，然後回傳或回呼處理期間驗證事件。A control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during postback or callback handling. 例如，如果清單控制項包含選項、 轉譯頁面時，如果回傳的要求收到指定選項的數字 4 進行編號 1、 2 或 3，ASP.NET 會引發例外狀況。For example, if a list control includes options numbered 1, 2, or 3 when the page is rendered, and if a postback request is received specifying option number 4, ASP.NET raises an exception. 在 ASP.NET 中的所有事件導向控制項預設會都使用這項功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default. 如果您撰寫用戶端指令碼，以在執行階段變更的用戶端中的控制項，您可能必須使用方法，以避免 false 事件驗證錯誤。If you write client script that changes a control in the client at run time, you might have to use the method in order to avoid false event validation errors. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這項功能會減少未經授權或惡意的回傳要求和回呼的風險。This feature reduces the risk of unauthorized or malicious postback requests and callbacks. 強烈建議您不要停用事件驗證。It is strongly recommended that you do not disable event validation. 您設定藉由設定屬性`enableEventValidation`屬性指示詞或`enableEventValidation`Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。You set the property by setting the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 如果您在程式碼中設定這個屬性，您必須設定它，才能初始化頁面。If you set this property in code, you must set it before the page is initialized.

exception.span: 屬性已在頁面初始化之後設定。

span.span: The property was set after the page was initialized.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在目前的網頁要求結束時，網頁是否要保持其檢視狀態和它所包含的任何伺服器控制項的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page maintains its view state, and the view state of any server controls it contains, when the current page request ends.

value.span: 如果網頁保持其檢視狀態則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the page maintains its view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可能希望停用檢視狀態的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about why you might want to disable view state, see . 即使是`false`，頁面可能會包含可用來偵測回傳 asp.net 隱藏的檢視狀態欄位。Even if is `false`, the page might contain a hidden view state field that is used by ASP.NET to detect a postback. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性`false`時載入的頁面。The following code example sets the property to `false` when the page is loaded. 這會停用檢視狀態物件，代表會儲存 既不網頁的檢視狀態資訊或頁面所包含的任何控制項。This disables view state for the object, meaning that neither view-state information for the page nor any controls contained by the page are saved. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1/CS/page_enableviewstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1/VB/page_enableviewstate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableViewStateMac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示從用戶端回傳網頁時，ASP.NET 是否應該檢查網頁檢視狀態中的訊息驗證碼 (MAC)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET should check message authentication codes (MAC) in the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

value.span: 如果應該對檢視狀態執行 MAC 檢查和編碼，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the view state should be MAC checked and encoded; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態 MAC 是網頁的檢視狀態保存至網頁傳送到瀏覽器時隱藏變數的加密的版本。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，加密的檢視狀態會檢查以確認，它未被竄改用戶端上。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. 程式碼中未設定這個屬性。Do not set this property in code. 設定`EnableViewStateMac`屬性使用.aspx 檔案中的指示詞。Set the `EnableViewStateMac` attribute using the directive in the .aspx file. 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別設定的屬性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個屬性應永遠不會設定為`false`生產網站中，即使應用程式或網頁不使用檢視狀態。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 檢視狀態 MAC 可協助確保其他 ASP.NET 函式，除了檢視狀態的安全性。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks() cil managed

summary.span: 開始執行非同步工作。

span.span: Starts the execution of an asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義非同步工作使用類別。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 工作定義，並向頁面使用之後方法，可以叫用方法來開始執行非同步工作。After the task is defined, and is registered with the page using the method, the method can be invoked to begin the asynchronous task. 會自動呼叫方法中的點頁面上，處理任何已註冊的非同步工作，如果有的話，會叫用非非同步頁面。The method is automatically called at the point in the page processing when any registered asynchronous tasks, if they exist, are invoked for a non-asynchronous page. 此自動呼叫之前發生事件。This automatic call to occurs just before the event. 呼叫方法您想要在叫用自動呼叫這個方法以外的工作。Call the method for tasks you want to be invoked at times other than the automatic call to this method. 請注意，只有一次即使執行非同步工作可能呼叫一次以上。Note, asynchronous tasks will be executed only once even though may be called more than once. 屬性在每次呼叫重設方法。The property is reset on every call to the method. 最後一個值再叫用方法的優先順序。The last value of the prior to invoking the method takes precedence. 如果在非同步工作超過，後續的工作期間，會叫用呼叫會立即逾時。If an asynchronous task takes more than the , subsequent tasks invoked during that call are timed out immediately. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，以示範非同步工作超過分配的時間中所指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作無法用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生影像，例如和逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作不會在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

exception.span: 非同步工作中發生例外狀況。

span.span: There is an exception in the asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以用來存取控制其不在執行階段。The method can be used to access a control whose is not available at design time. 方法會搜尋只有頁面的立即，或最上層容器;它會不以遞迴方式搜尋頁面上所包含的命名容器中的控制項。The method searches only the page's immediate, or top-level, container; it does not recursively search for controls in naming containers contained on the page. 若要存取次級的命名容器中的控制項，呼叫`FindControl`該容器的方法。To access controls in a subordinate naming container, call the `FindControl` method of that container. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來找出範本內的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate controls inside templates. 在此範例中，兩個控制項定義中，每個會顯示不同的方式，來攔截事件內中繼器項目範本。In this example, two controls are defined; each shows a different way to catch the event of a inside the repeater item template. remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了兩種機制，將控制項從一個頁面傳輸至另一個。ASP.NET provides two mechanisms for transferring control from one page to another. 您可以使用方法來處理傳輸之間的頁面，或者您可以藉由指定的頁面 URL 提出跨網頁要求實作按鈕控制項屬性介面。You can use the method to transfer processing between pages, or you can make a cross-page request by assigning a page URL to the property of a button control that implements the interface. 在任一情況下，頁面屬性將包含物件，代表先前或建立者 頁面。In either case, the page property will contain an object that represents the previous or originator page. 如果頁面，例如張貼至頁面 B，頁面的屬性 (可透過存取屬性) 會`true`和頁面 B屬性會有的頁面 A.名稱If, for example, Page A posts to Page B, Page A's property (accessible through the property) will be `true` and Page B's property will have the name of Page A.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需回傳與回呼之間的差異的說明，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For an explanation of the difference between postbacks and callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何測試的值屬性以判斷頁面是否轉譯第一次，或回應回傳載入的頁面時。The following example shows how to test the value of the property when the page is loaded in order to determine whether the page is being rendered for the first time or is responding to a postback. 如果正在轉譯頁面第一次，則程式碼會呼叫方法。If the page is being rendered for the first time, the code calls the method. （未顯示） 的網頁標記包含顯示星號，如果項目不進行必要的輸入欄位的控制項。The page markup (not shown) contains controls that display asterisks if no entry is made for a required input field. 呼叫會導致立即頁面呈現的時間，而不是等待，直到使用者按一下 [提交] 按鈕顯示的星號。Calling causes the asterisks to be displayed immediately when the page is rendered, instead of waiting until the user clicks the Submit button. 回傳之後, 您不需要呼叫，因為會呼叫該方法的一部分生命週期。After a postback, you do not have to call , because that method is called as part of the life cycle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行初始設定和安裝所需的步驟來建立執行個體。The method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a instance. 在此階段網頁的生命週期中，宣告的伺服器頁面上的控制項會初始化為其預設狀態。不過，每個控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated. 頁面上的控制項無法存取其他伺服器控制項在頁面上的`Page_Init`階段中的，不論其他控制項是否為子系或父控制項。A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls. 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 方法之後呼叫方法之前方法。The method is called after the method and before the method. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁初始化完成之後，呼叫方法。The method is called after page initialization is complete. 在網頁的生命週期的這個階段，所有宣告都已初始化頁面上的控制項，但尚未填入網頁的檢視狀態。In this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's view state is not yet populated. 您可以存取伺服器控制項，但它們尚未包含從使用者傳回的資訊。You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user. 方法結尾處，就會發生初始化階段，以及載入階段之前。The method occurs at the end of the initialization stage and before the load stage. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 要求和回應會原本是無狀態。HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 若要維護之間的 HTTP 要求的狀態，可以儲存伺服器的 ASP.NET 網頁狀態。To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此狀態下，稱為檢視狀態包含網頁、 控制項設定和資料，讓網頁及控制項顯示如同它們是相同的使用者所看到和其最後一個的來回行程的頁面互動。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page. 若要儲存檢視狀態相同的頁面上的連續要求之間，有多個機制。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. 抽象類別代表這些狀態的儲存機制的基底類別。The abstract class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms. 網頁開發人員通常不需要使用屬性。Page developers will typically not need to use the property. 屬性主要由控制項開發人員擴充的功能使用類別。The property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the class.

summary.span: 字串，定義呈現頁面中的 EVENTARGUMENT 隱藏欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您檢查條件，頁面要求，例如網頁是否正在載入中回傳的回應。This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback. 您也可以檢查設定檔屬性的值。You can also check the values of profile properties. 事件可讓您設定稍後用於頁面生命週期的值。The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle. 您可以動態設定主版頁面或 [要求] 頁面的佈景主題和建立動態控制項。You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls. 如需有關如何事件納入 ASP.NET 存留週期，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information about how the event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面生命週期的呈現前階段完成時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete. 在頁面生命週期的這個階段，所有控制項已都建立、 完成的任何所需的分頁，並且頁面已準備好呈現給輸出。At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output. 這是網頁的檢視狀態儲存之前，所引發的最後一個事件。This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義非同步工作使用類別。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 定義工作時，使用工作向頁面的方法。When the task is defined, use the method to register the task with the page. 在註冊之後的工作，叫用方法開始非同步工作。After registering the task, invoke the method to begin the asynchronous task. 方法可用以同步和非同步頁面。The method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，以示範非同步工作超過分配的時間中所指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作無法用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生影像，例如和逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作不會在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果網頁正在執行以回應透過 ASP.NET 路由所提出的要求，這個屬性會提供存取權的 URL 參數值傳遞做為路由資料。If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data. 如果頁面執行以回應實體的 URL，而非路由的 URL，這個屬性是`null`。If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`. 下列範例示範如何擷取名為 URL 參數的值`year`。The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`. ```vb Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` ```csharp int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` 如果使用的 URL 模式來定義路由`{locale}/{year}`網域`contoso.com`，而且如果要求的 URL 是`contoso.com/US/2010`，`year`就會包含值"2010"執行此程式碼。If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs. 如需 ASP.NET 路由的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用方法所參考物件屬性來儲存網頁的檢視狀態和控制狀態資訊。The method uses the method of the object referenced by the property to store view-state and control-state information for the page. ASP.NET 包含兩個下階的類別ASP.NET 網頁中包含隱藏欄位中儲存狀態資訊的類別和儲存狀態中的類別與相關聯的物件要求。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 請注意，當使用隱藏的 VIEWSTATE 欄位仍轉譯因為這用來判斷回傳的類別。Note that when using the class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back. 若要將狀態儲存在您選擇的位置，您應該建立新的子系儲存和載入至持續性媒體狀態，您所選擇的類別。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 如需範例，建立新的物件，請參閱類別。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果您使用.NET Framework 版本為 1.0 或 1.1，覆寫這個方法，如果您想要儲存隱藏欄位以外的任何項目狀態。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the state in anything other than a hidden field. 如果您選擇這樣做，您也必須覆寫方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 網頁上控制項的狀態資訊會儲存之後事件。State information for controls on the Web page is saved after the event. 的檢視狀態和頁面的控制項狀態之後，就會引發事件，控制項在頁面上會儲存至持續性中。The event is raised after the view state and control state of the page and controls on the page are saved to the persistence medium. 這是最後一個要求的瀏覽器中呈現網頁之前引發的事件。This is the last event raised before the page is rendered to the requesting browser. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供目前要求的工作階段的相關資訊。This property provides information about the current request's session. A`Session`物件會維護每個使用者，從 ASP.NET 應用程式要求的頁面或文件。A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application. 變數會儲存在`Session`物件不會遭到捨棄當使用者將頁面從應用程式中; 相反地，這些變數會保存，只要使用者存取您的應用程式中的頁面。Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application. 如需有關工作階段狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立`GetStyle`函式，以擷取儲存在 Web Form 網頁的工作階段狀態中的金鑰，並將它的值轉換為字串。The following code example creates a `GetStyle` function that retrieves a key stored in the session state of the Web Forms page and converts its value to a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定`SmartNavigation`屬性`true`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中。Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file. 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別就會設定這個屬性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，屬性已被取代。In ASP.NET version 2.0, the property is deprecated. 使用方法和屬性改為。Use the method and the property instead. 要求由 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 瀏覽器或更新版本的智慧瀏覽網頁時增強使用者經驗 頁面執行下列：When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - 消除因導覽 flash。Eliminating the flash caused by navigation. - 當您移動頁面之間保存捲軸位置。Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page. - 保存的項目焦點之間巡覽。Persisting element focus between navigations. - 保留在瀏覽器的歷程記錄只有最後一個頁面狀態。Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history. 具有需要時常回傳、 ASP.NET 網頁，但不會變更大幅在傳回的視覺內容，是最適合用智慧型巡覽。Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return. 決定是否要將此屬性設定為時仔細考慮這`true`。Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不是指直接階層式樣式表 (CSS)。This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS). 屬性包含 ASP.NET 佈景主題，其中可以包括 CSS 檔案中的名稱。The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it. 屬性指定的早期頁面生命週期中，套用至頁面的佈景主題名稱，而屬性會指定在稍後頁面生命週期中套用至頁面的佈景主題名稱。The property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle. 這表示，頁面上的設定優先於樣式表主題中的設定。This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 在頁面指示詞中，或藉由覆寫屬性，通常會設定這個屬性的值。You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property. 如需資訊，請參閱下列主題：For information, see the following topics: - [如何： 將 ASP.NET 佈景主題套用How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9d72364-4d77-4b73-84be-7630dc63e0fe) - [如何： 以程式設計方式套用 ASP.NET 主題](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤會追蹤，並顯示 Web 要求的相關執行詳細資料。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 顯示在轉譯頁面的追蹤資料，您必須啟用頁面或應用程式層級的追蹤。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level. 預設為停用頁面上的追蹤。Tracing on a page is disabled by default. 若要啟用網頁的追蹤，請使用指示詞`<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。To enable tracing for a page, use the directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`. 若要啟用追蹤整個應用程式，您必須應用程式的組態檔中，位於應用程式的根目錄中的 Web.config 中啟用它。To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取屬性和方法，透過屬性。The following code example demonstrates accessing the property and the method through the property. 此程式碼會呼叫方法追蹤時，才會啟用物件。This code calls the method only when tracing is enabled for the object. 如果未啟用，這段程式碼不會執行，以減少您的應用程式的額外負荷。If it is not enabled, this code will not run, which can help reduce overhead for your application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表的使用者，使其程式碼會執行，包括該使用者的身分識別和它們所屬的任何角色的安全性內容。An object represents the security context of the user on whose behalf the code is running, including that user's identity and any roles to which they belong. 這個屬性會使用物件的屬性來判斷出要求的來源。This property uses the object's property to determine where the request originates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來存取目前使用者的驗證和身分識別資訊。The following code example uses the property to access authentication and identity information for the current user. 如果使用者未經過驗證，它將他們重新導向至登入頁面。If the user is not authenticated, it redirects them to a login page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用，當使用者按一下具有任何 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，預設值。This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default. 這些包括， ，和Web 伺服器控制項， ，和HTML 伺服器控制項和控制項，可以自動回傳至伺服器，例如， ， ，和控制項。These include the , , and Web server controls, the , , and HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the , , , and controls. 若要停用任何頁面上的按鈕控制項的驗證，請將設定按鈕控制項的`CausesValidation`屬性`false`。To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`. 叫用這個方法時，它會逐一包含在驗證控制項物件相關聯屬性，並叫用目前的驗證群組中每個驗證控制項的驗證邏輯。When this method is invoked, it iterates through the validation controls contained in the object associated with the property and invokes the validation logic for each validation control in the current validation group. 驗證群組取決於公佈到伺服器 頁面的控制項。The validation group is determined by the control that posted the page to the server. 如果驗證未不指定任何群組，則會不使用任何驗證群組。If no validation group is specified, then no validation group is used. > [!NOTE] > 頁面驗證的行為已經變更。The behavior of page validation has changed. 在[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，控制項不再呼叫方法; 它們使用方法改為。In [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], controls no longer call the method; they use the method instead. 如果您使用方法[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]頁面，驗證群組會被忽略，而且會驗證所有的控制項。If you use the method on an [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] page, validation groups are ignored and all controls are validated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫定義數個不同的驗證群組的案例中的頁面上的方法。The following code example calls the method on a page in a scenario with several different validation groups defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來操作的方法和屬性的目前相關聯的物件執行個體。You can use this property to manipulate the methods and properties of the object associated with the current instance. 此集合包含頁面中所包含的所有驗證伺服器控制項。This collection contains all the validation server controls that are contained in a page. 呼叫方法會導致目前的驗證群組中每個驗證伺服器控制項執行驗證邏輯。Calling the method causes validation logic to be executed for each validation server control in the current validation group. 如果未傳遞任何這些控制項，屬性會傳回`false`。If any of these controls do not pass, the property returns `false`. 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 驗證控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef)。For more information on validation controls, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 必須是內部的控制項`
`標記呈現，讓它們被放在標記外部顯示錯誤訊息之前，可以呼叫這個方法。Controls that are required to be inside `` tags can call this method before they render so that an error message is shown if they are placed outside the tags. 控制項的回傳或取決於已註冊的指令碼區塊應該呼叫這個方法的覆寫中方法。Controls that post back or depend on registered script blocks should call this method in an override of the method. 具有不同的方式轉譯伺服器表單項目頁面，可以覆寫這個方法會擲回例外狀況在不同情況下。Pages that have a different way of rendering the server form element can override this method to throw an exception under different conditions. 如果不放在伺服器控制項的回傳或用戶端指令碼將無法運作伺服器控制項 (<`form runat="server">`) 標記。Server controls that post back or use client-side script will not work if they are not enclosed in the server control (<`form runat="server">`) tags. 這些控制項可以呼叫這個方法，提供明確的錯誤訊息時不放在呈現時控制項。These controls can call this method when they render to provide a clear error message when they are not enclosed in the control. 當您開發自訂的伺服器控制項時，通常會呼叫這個方法，當您覆寫`Render`任何種類的輸入標記的方法。When you develop a custom server control, it is common to call this method when you override the `Render` method for any kind of input tag. 這是非常重要，如果輸入的控制項呼叫，或如果發出用戶端指令碼。This is particularly important if the input control calls , or if it emits client script. 複合伺服器控制項不需要進行這個呼叫。A composite server control does not need to make this call. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫自訂伺服器控制項的方法。The following code example overrides the method of a custom server control. 當此控制項將其內容寫入頁面時，它會使用方法以確定該控制項會出現開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。When this control writes its content to a page, it uses the method to make sure that the control appears between the opening and closing tags of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm/CS/testlinkbutton.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_VerifyRenderingInServerForm/vb/testlinkbutton.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法在程式碼中設定屬性。The property cannot be set in code. 它只能設定指示詞中或在 < 組態檔元素。It can only be set in the directive or in the < element of the configuration file. 指示詞覆寫中設定的值設定在組態檔中的所有值。Values set in the directive override any values set in the configuration file. 指示詞中設定這個屬性的語法如下所示：The syntax for setting this property in the directive is as follows: ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" ViewStateEncryptionMode="Always" %> ``` 組態檔中設定這個屬性的語法如下所示：The syntax for setting this property in the configuration file is as follows: ```vb ``` ```csharp ``` 自訂控制項開發人員可能想要儲存檢視狀態，其控制項中的潛在的敏感資料前先檢查程式碼中的此屬性的值。Custom control developers may wish to check the value of this property in code before saving potentially sensitive data to view state in their control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性可協助您避免在您的應用程式，惡意使用者攻擊。Setting the property can help you prevent attacks on your application from malicious users. 這樣可讓您指派給個別使用者的檢視狀態變數的識別項，使其無法使用此變數產生攻擊。It does this by allowing you to assign an identifier to the view-state variable for individual users so that they cannot use the variable to generate an attack. 如需有關網站的攻擊，以及您可以如何協助防止它們的詳細資訊，請參閱[需要利用的 ASP.NET 內建功能擊退 Web 攻擊](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557)。For more information about Web attacks and about what you can do to help prevent them, see [Take Advantage of ASP.NET Built-in Features to Fend Off Web Attacks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557). 您可以為任何字串值，設定這個屬性，例如使用者的已驗證的名稱或值。You can set this property to any string value, such as the user's authenticated name or the value. > [!NOTE] > 您必須將此屬性期間`Page_Init`網頁處理的階段。You must set this property during the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 設定這個屬性期間`Page_Load`階段會擲回的例外狀況。Setting this property during the `Page_Load` phase throws an exception.
